name: 0 - Intro
_source: speak;Sonia; Shit... We're surrounded by the undead...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Sonia; Don't worry guys, we just need to hold them off until Caroline comes back with the girls.
speak;Marica; Yeah, you're right!{w} Let's send those undead back to their graves!{w} Caroline should be back at any moment!
speak;Sonia; That's the spirit!{w} Lily, just stay behind me!
speak;Lily; I'm with you, Sonia!{w} I'll heal you as much as possible!
speak;Emma; The village{tgm}...{tgm}{w} It's almost completely destroyed{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Those monsters, they{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; I know you're in shock,{w} but we need to keep it together to drive back these demons.
speak;Emily; There's no time to spare!{w} We gotta rush them all!
speak;Emma; Emily, for once, stop being so hard-headed!{w} If you hadn't taken us out of the village to shoot some stupid rabbit,{w} we would've been here to help fight these monsters off!
speak;Emily; Oh, so now I'm the one at fault for wanting to spend time with my sister?!{w} Do you even know how twisted that sounds?
speak;Emily; How could I have known about the monsters?!
speak;Emma; That's not the point!{w} You never think about the consequences of your actions!{w} Emily wants to do whatever Emily wants to do. We even left Mom behind!
speak;Emily; Hey, you seemed happy enough about it!{w} You're gonna push the blame onto me now that things seem bad?
speak;Emma; I'm not asking you to take all the blame!{w} I'm asking you to shut up and use your head for once so we don't all die!
speak;Emily; Fine, as you command.{w} You take charge then, Miss Killjoy.
speak;Emma; I swear, Emily, I'll burn your hands right off-
speak;Caroline; Girls!{w} I know you're distraught, but this isn't the time to argue.{w} The village needs us!{w} You can save your spat for later!
